Instruction: In a bowl, combine paneer, Greek yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, garam masala, coriander powder, cumin powder, turmeric powder, red chili powder, and lemon juice. Marinate for at least 30 minutes.
Roast cashews in a dry skillet until golden brown.
Blend roasted cashews, onion, tomatoes, ginger-garlic paste, garam masala, coriander powder, cumin powder, red chili powder, and turmeric powder into a smooth paste.
Heat ghee in a pan. Add the onion-tomato paste and cook until oil separates.
Add the marinated paneer cubes and cook until golden brown on all sides.
Pour in 2 cups of water and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 10 minutes.
Add heavy cream and kasuri methi. Simmer for 2-3 minutes.
Serve hot with naan or rice.
